summary: Following the death of a mother, a father and son open up a brothel in their Genevan estate after watching Fellini 8½ (1963).
cast: John Standing|Matthew Delamere|Vivian Wu|Annie Shizuka Inoh|Barbara Sarafian|Kirina Mano|Toni Collette|Amanda Plummer|Natacha Amal|Manna Fujiwara|Polly Walker|Elizabeth Berrington|Myriam Muller|Don Warrington|Claire Johnston|Pol Hoffmann|Tony Kaye|Ann Overstall Comfort|Malcolm Turner|Patrick Hastert|Julian Nest|Ciaran Mulhern|John Overstall|Derek Kueter|Jules Werner|Sophie Langevin|Denise Gregoire|Sascha Ley|Bettina Scheuritzel|Radica Jovicic|Jill Mercedes|Dean Harrington|Noriyuki Konishi|Jean-Gabriel Dupuy|Stéphane Prevot|Katsuya Kobayashi|Ryota Tsuchiya|Takumi Matsui|Kiyosi Ishiguro|Hairi Katagiri|Yurika Sano|Satomi Ando|Sachiko Meguro|Hisayuki Yoshioka|Hanji Mishima|Toyonosuke Fujima|Kango Fujima|Senyoichi Nishikawa|Vladimir Bogachov|Peter Greenaway
title: 8 mujeres y ½
